message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. It's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Can you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. Can you see if you can do any better?
I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $105?
I'm getting closer to what I'm looking for, but I still need to save a bit more. Can you see if you can do any better?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $100, Bob. That's the lowest I can go. If you're interested, this is my final offer. Otherwise, I'll have to consider other options.
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with $100, but I'm still interested in the product. Can you meet me at $92.50?
I'm not going to go any lower than $97.50, Bob. That's my absolute minimum. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid we're at an impasse.
I'm not willing to pay $97.50, but I'm still interested in the product. Can you meet me at $90?
